abstract: Stephen Bird, the chief executive of the bank’s Asia-Pacific business, will succeed Manuel Medina-Mora as head of its global consumer bank in June.
snippet: Stephen Bird, the chief executive of the bank’s Asia-Pacific business, will succeed Manuel Medina-Mora as head of its global consumer bank in June.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup said on Monday that it had shuffled its executive ranks as Manuel Medina-Mora, its co-president and the head of its global consumer bank, prepares to retire.

headline.main: Citigroup Names New Head of Consumer Bank in Management Shuffle
